verses.verse: After <WG3326> these <WG3778> things <WG3778> Jesus <WG2424> manifested <WG5319> Himself <WG1438> again <WG3825> to the disciples <WG3101> at the Sea <WG2281> of Tiberias, <WG5085> and He manifested <WG5319> [Himself] in this <WG3779> way. <WG3779>

There were together <WG3674> Simon <WG4613> Peter, <WG4074> and Thomas <WG2381> called <WG3004> Didymus, <WG1324> and Nathanael <WG3482> of Cana <WG2580> in Galilee, <WG1056> and the [sons] of Zebedee, <WG2199> and two <WG1417> others <WG243> of His disciples. <WG3101>

Simon <WG4613> Peter <WG4074> said <WG3004> to them, "I am going <WG5217> fishing. <WG232>" They said <WG3004> to him, "We will also <WG2532> come <WG2064> with you." They went <WG1831> out, and got <WG1684> into the boat; <WG4143> and that night <WG3571> they caught <WG4084> nothing. <WG3762>

But when the day <WG4407> was now <WG2235> breaking, <WG1096> <WG4407> Jesus <WG2424> stood <WG2476> on the beach; <WG123> yet <WG3305> the disciples <WG3101> did not know <WG3609> that it was Jesus. <WG2424>
Jesus <WG2424> therefore <WG3767> said <WG3004> to them, "Children, <WG3813> you do not have <WG2192> any <WG5100> fish, <WG4371> do you?" They answered <WG611> Him, "No. <WG3756>"

And He said <WG3004> to them, "Cast <WG906> the net <WG1350> on the right-hand side <WG3313> of the boat, <WG4143> and you will find <WG2147> [a catch]." They cast <WG906> therefore, <WG3767> and then <WG3765> they were not able <WG2480> to haul <WG1670> it in because <WG575> of the great <WG4128> number <WG4128> of fish. <WG2486>

That disciple <WG3101> therefore <WG3767> whom <WG3739> Jesus <WG2424> loved <WG25> said <WG3004> to Peter, <WG4074> "It is the Lord. <WG2962>" And so <WG3767> when Simon <WG4613> Peter <WG4074> heard <WG191> that it was the Lord, <WG2962> he put <WG1241> his outer <WG1903> garment <WG1903> on (for he was stripped <WG1131> [for work]), and threw <WG906> himself <WG1438> into the sea. <WG2281>

But the other <WG243> disciples <WG3101> came <WG2064> in the little <WG4142> boat, <WG4142> for they were not far <WG3112> from the land, <WG1093> but about <WG5613> one <WG1250> hundred <WG1250> yards <WG4083> away, <WG575> dragging <WG4951> the net <WG1350> [full] of fish. <WG2486>

And so <WG3767> when <WG5613> they got <WG576> out upon the land, <WG1093> they saw <WG991> a charcoal <WG439> fire <WG439> [already] laid, <WG2749> and fish <WG3795> placed <WG1945> on it, and bread. <WG740>
Jesus <WG2424> said <WG3004> to them, "Bring <WG5342> some <WG575> of the fish <WG3795> which <WG3739> you have now <WG3568> caught. <WG4084>"

Simon <WG4613> Peter <WG4074> went <WG305> up, and drew <WG1670> the net <WG1350> to land, <WG1093> full <WG3324> of large <WG3173> fish, <WG2486> a hundred <WG1540> and fifty-three; and although there were so <WG5118> many, <WG5118> the net <WG1350> was not torn. <WG4977>

Jesus <WG2424> said <WG3004> to them, "Come <WG1205> [and] have <WG709> breakfast. <WG709>" None <WG3762> of the disciples <WG3101> ventured <WG5111> to question <WG1833> Him, "Who <WG5101> are You?" knowing <WG3609> that it was the Lord. <WG2962>
Jesus <WG2424> came <WG2064> and took <WG2983> the bread, <WG740> and gave <WG1325> them, and the fish <WG3795> likewise. <WG3668>
This <WG3778> is now <WG2235> the third <WG5154> time <WG5154> that Jesus <WG2424> was manifested <WG5319> to the disciples, <WG3101> after He was raised <WG1453> from the dead. <WG3498>

So <WG3767> when <WG3753> they had finished <WG709> breakfast, <WG709> Jesus <WG2424> said <WG3004> to Simon <WG4613> Peter, <WG4074> "Simon, <WG4613> [son] of John, <WG2491> do you love <WG25> Me more <WG4183> than these <WG3778>?" He said <WG3004> to Him, "Yes, <WG3483> Lord; <WG2962> You know <WG3609> that I love <WG5368> You." He said <WG3004> to him, "Tend <WG1006> My lambs. <WG721>"

He said <WG3004> to him again <WG3825> a second <WG1208> time, <WG1208> "Simon, <WG4613> [son] of John, <WG2491> do you love <WG25> Me?" He said <WG3004> to Him, "Yes, <WG3483> Lord; <WG2962> You know <WG3609> that I love <WG5368> You." He said <WG3004> to him, "Shepherd <WG4165> My sheep. <WG4263>"

He said <WG3004> to him the third <WG5154> time, <WG5154> "Simon, <WG4613> [son] of John, <WG2491> do you love <WG5368> Me?" Peter <WG4074> was grieved <WG3076> because <WG3754> He said <WG3004> to him the third <WG5154> time, <WG5154> "Do you love <WG5368> Me?" And he said <WG3004> to Him, "Lord, <WG2962> You know <WG3609> all <WG3956> things; <WG3956> You know <WG1097> that I love <WG5368> You. "Jesus <WG2424> said <WG3004> to him, "Tend <WG1006> My sheep. <WG4263>

"Truly, <WG281> truly, <WG281> I say <WG3004> to you, when <WG3753> you were younger, <WG3501> you used to gird <WG2224> yourself, <WG4572> and walk <WG4043> wherever <WG3699> you wished; <WG2309> but when <WG3752> you grow <WG1095> old, <WG1095> you will stretch <WG1614> out your hands, <WG5495> and someone <WG243> else <WG243> will gird <WG2224> you, and bring <WG5342> you where <WG3699> you do not wish <WG2309> to [go."]

Now <WG1161> this <WG3778> He said, <WG3004> signifying <WG4591> by what <WG4169> kind <WG4169> of death <WG2288> he would glorify <WG1392> God. <WG2316> And when He had spoken <WG3004> this, <WG3778> He said <WG3004> to him, "Follow <WG190> Me!"

Peter, <WG4074> turning <WG1994> around, <WG1994> saw <WG991> the disciple <WG3101> whom <WG3739> Jesus <WG2424> loved <WG25> following <WG190> [them;] the one who <WG3739> also <WG2532> had leaned <WG377> back <WG377> on His breast <WG4738> at the supper, <WG1173> and said, <WG3004> "Lord, <WG2962> who <WG5101> is the one who betrays <WG3860> You?"
Peter <WG4074> therefore <WG3767> seeing <WG3708> him said <WG3004> to Jesus, <WG2424> "Lord, <WG2962> and what <WG5101> about this <WG3778> man <WG3778>?"
Jesus <WG2424> said <WG3004> to him, "If <WG1437> I want <WG2309> him to remain <WG3306> until <WG2193> I come, <WG2064> what <WG5101> [is that] to you? You follow <WG190> Me!"

This <WG3778> saying <WG3056> therefore <WG3767> went <WG1831> out among <WG1519> the brethren <WG80> that that disciple <WG3101> would not die; <WG599> yet <WG1161> Jesus <WG2424> did not say <WG3004> to him that he would not die, <WG599> but [only,] "If <WG1437> I want <WG2309> him to remain <WG3306> until <WG2193> I come, <WG2064> what <WG5101> [is that] to you?"

This <WG3778> is the disciple <WG3101> who bears <WG3140> witness <WG3140> of these <WG3778> things, <WG3778> and wrote <WG1125> these <WG3778> things; <WG3778> and we know <WG3609> that his witness <WG3141> is true. <WG227>

And there are also <WG2532> many <WG4183> other <WG243> things <WG4183> which <WG3739> Jesus <WG2424> did, <WG4160> which <WG3748> if <WG1437> they were written <WG1125> in detail, <WG1520> I suppose <WG3633> that even <WG3761> the world <WG2889> itself <WG846> would not contain <WG5562> the books <WG975> which were written. <WG1125>
